name: Customization: Blank Help and Report a Problem hides options from help menu

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes: NOTE: Cloud only tests Blank Help; Report a Problem is `Cloud N/A`

inline.description:
Customization
Blank Help and Report a Problem hides options from main menu
--------------------
1. Edit the links in the "Help" and "Report a Problem" fields to leave them BLANK.
2. Save
3. Switch back to a team
4. Open Main Menu
inline.expectedResult: Report a Problem and Help links in the main menu should be hidden.
